Translations.Text: Na shcho denʹ, kozhna dusha bude requited dlya shchob ni tse zaroblene. Tam bude niyaka nespravedlyvistʹ na tomu dni. BOH ye naybilʹsh efektyvnyy u rozrakhunku
Poperedzhayutʹ yikh pro nemynuchyy denʹ, koly serdenʹka budutʹ strakhatysya, ta bahato budutʹ remorseful. Porushnyky budutʹ ne maty tovarysha ne poserednyka pidkoryatysya
Vin znaye tsilkom shcho ochi ne mozhe pobachyty, ta vse shcho rozum prykhovuyutʹ
BOH pryymaye rishennya equitably, v toy chas, yak idoly vony blahayutʹ bilya Yoho ne mozhutʹ pryymaty rishennya budʹ shcho. BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Seer

vony ne blukaly zemlya ta prymitka naslidky dlya tsykh pered tym, yak yim? Vony zvychayno buly mitsnishi nizh vony, ta bilʹshe produktyvni na zemli. Ale BOH pokarav yikh dlya yikhnikh hrikhiv, ta nichoho ne mih zakhystyty yikh z BOHA
Shcho tomu, shcho yikhni kur'yery poyikhaly yim z yasnymy dokazamy, ale vony disbelieved. Otzhe, BOH pokarav yikh. Vin ye Mohutniy, chitkyy u prymushuyuchomu retribution
My poslaly Moses z nashymy znakamy ta hlybokym avtorytetom
Pharaoh, Haamaan, ta Qaaroon. Ale vony skazaly, charivnyk; brekhun
Ta koly vin pokazav yim pravdu z nas, vony skazaly, "Ubyvayutʹ syniv tsykh khto vvazhaly z nym, ta zapasni yikhni dochky." Otzhe, zamyshlyayuchyy disbelievers ye zavzhdy bezputnyy
